cards.name: Æthersnipe
cards.text:
When Æthersnipe enters the battlefield, return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
Evoke {1}{U}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

cards.name: Air Elemental
cards.text: Flying
cards.flavor: Pray that it doesn't seek the safety of your lungs.

cards.name: Ancestral Vision
cards.text:
Suspend 4—{U} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, pay {U} and exile it with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)
Target player draws three cards.

cards.name: Bottle Gnomes
cards.text: Sacrifice Bottle Gnomes: You gain 3 life.
cards.flavor: Reinforcements . . . or refreshments?

cards.name: Brine Elemental
cards.text:
Morph {5}{U}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Brine Elemental is turned face up, each opponent skips his or her next untap step.
cards.flavor: Water calls to water, and the world is left exhausted and withered in its wake.

cards.name: Chandra Nalaar
cards.text:
+1: Chandra Nalaar deals 1 damage to target player.
−X: Chandra Nalaar deals X damage to target creature.
−8: Chandra Nalaar deals 10 damage to target player and each creature he or she controls.

cards.name: Chartooth Cougar
cards.text:
{R}: Chartooth Cougar gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Mountaincycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Mountain card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.)

cards.name: Condescend
cards.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

cards.name: Cone of Flame
cards.text: Cone of Flame deals 1 damage to target creature or player, 2 damage to another target creature or player, and 3 damage to a third target creature or player.

cards.name: Counterspell
cards.text: Counter target spell.
cards.flavor: The pyromancer summoned up her mightiest onslaught of fire and rage. Jace feigned interest.

cards.name: Daze
cards.text:
You may return an Island you control to its owner's hand rather than pay Daze's mana cost.
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.

cards.name: Demonfire
cards.text:
Demonfire deals X damage to target creature or player. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
Hellbent — If you have no cards in hand, Demonfire can't be countered by spells or abilities and the damage can't be prevented.

cards.name: Errant Ephemeron
cards.text:
Flying
Suspend 4—{1}{U} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{U} and exile it with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

cards.name: Fact or Fiction
cards.text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.
cards.flavor: "Try to pretend like you understand what's important."

cards.name: Fathom Seer
cards.text:
Morph—Return two Islands you control to their owner's hand. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Fathom Seer is turned face up, draw two cards.

cards.name: Fireball
cards.text:
Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of target creatures and/or players.
Fireball costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
cards.flavor: The spell fell upon the crowd like a dragon, ancient and full of death.

cards.name: Fireblast
cards.text:
You may sacrifice two Mountains rather than pay Fireblast's mana cost.
Fireblast deals 4 damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor: Embermages aren't well known for their diplomatic skills.

cards.name: Firebolt
cards.text:
Firebolt deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
Flashback {4}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
cards.flavor: Reach out and torch someone.

cards.name: Fireslinger
cards.text: {T}: Fireslinger deals 1 damage to target creature or player and 1 damage to you.
cards.flavor:
"Remember the moral of the fireslinger fable: with power comes isolation."
—Karn, silver golem

cards.name: Flame Javelin
cards.text:
({2/R} can be paid with any two mana or with {R}. This card's converted mana cost is 6.)
Flame Javelin deals 4 damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor: Gyara Spearhurler would have been renowned for her deadly accuracy, if it weren't for her deadly accuracy.

cards.name: Flamekin Brawler
cards.text: {R}: Flamekin Brawler gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: When he hits people, they stay hit.

cards.name: Flametongue Kavu
cards.text: When Flametongue Kavu enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to target creature.
cards.flavor:
"For dim-witted, thick-skulled genetic mutants, they have pretty good aim."
—Sisay, captain of the Weatherlight

cards.name: Flamewave Invoker
cards.text: {7}{R}: Flamewave Invoker deals 5 damage to target player.
cards.flavor: Inside even the humblest goblin lurks the potential for far greater things—and far worse.

cards.name: Fledgling Mawcor
cards.text:
Flying
{T}: Fledgling Mawcor deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
Morph {U}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

cards.name: Furnace Whelp
cards.text:
Flying
{R}: Furnace Whelp gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Baby dragons can't figure out humans—if they didn't want to be killed, why were they made of meat and treasure?

cards.name: Guile
cards.text:
Guile can't be blocked except by three or more creatures.
If a spell or ability you control would counter a spell, instead exile that spell and you may play that card without paying its mana cost.
When Guile is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.

cards.name: Gush
cards.text:
You may return two Islands you control to their owner's hand rather than pay Gush's mana cost.
Draw two cards.
cards.flavor: Don't trust your secrets to the sea.

cards.name: Hostility
cards.text:
Haste
If a spell you control would deal damage to an opponent, prevent that damage. Put a 3/1 red Elemental Shaman creature token with haste onto the battlefield for each 1 damage prevented this way.
When Hostility is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.

cards.name: Incinerate
cards.text: Incinerate deals 3 damage to target creature or player. A creature dealt damage this way can't be regenerated this turn.
cards.flavor: "Who said there are no assurances in life? I assure you this is going to hurt."

cards.name: Ingot Chewer
cards.text:
When Ingot Chewer enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.
Evoke {R} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)
cards.flavor: Elementals are ideas given form. This one is the idea of "smashitude."

cards.name: Inner-Flame Acolyte
cards.text:
When Inner-Flame Acolyte enters the battlefield, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn.
Evoke {R} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

cards.name: Jace Beleren
cards.text:
+2: Each player draws a card.
−1: Target player draws a card.
−10: Target player puts the top twenty cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

cards.name: Keldon Megaliths
cards.text:
Keldon Megaliths enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.
Hellbent — {1}{R}, {T}: Keldon Megaliths deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Activate this ability only if you have no cards in hand.

cards.name: Magma Jet
cards.text: Magma Jet deals 2 damage to target creature or player. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

cards.name: Man-o'-War
cards.text: When Man-o'-War enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor:
"Beauty to the eye does not always translate to the touch."
—Naimah, Femeref philosopher

cards.name: Martyr of Frost
cards.text: {2}, Reveal X blue cards from your hand, Sacrifice Martyr of Frost: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}.
cards.flavor:
"Do not call the Balduvians barbaric. Their magic is as potent as it is primal."
—Zur the Enchanter

cards.name: Mind Stone
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Mind Stone: Draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"What is mana but possibility, an idea not yet given form?"
—Jhoira, master artificer

cards.name: Mulldrifter
cards.text:
Flying
When Mulldrifter enters the battlefield, draw two cards.
Evoke {2}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

cards.name: Ophidian
cards.text: Whenever Ophidian attacks and isn't blocked, you may draw a card. If you do, Ophidian assigns no combat damage this turn.

cards.name: Oxidda Golem
cards.text:
Affinity for Mountains (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Mountain you control.)
Haste
cards.flavor: The longer it patrols the smoldering crags of the Oxidda Chain, the more it adopts their fiery temper.

cards.name: Pyre Charger
cards.text:
Haste
{R}: Pyre Charger gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: His blade was forged over coals of moaning treefolk, curved at the optimum angle for severing heads, and heated to volcanic temperatures by his touch.

cards.name: Quicksilver Dragon
cards.text:
Flying
{U}: If target spell has only one target and that target is Quicksilver Dragon, change that spell's target to another creature.
Morph {4}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

cards.name: Rakdos Pit Dragon
cards.text:
{R}{R}: Rakdos Pit Dragon gains flying until end of turn.
{R}: Rakdos Pit Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Hellbent — Rakdos Pit Dragon has double strike as long as you have no cards in hand.

cards.name: Repulse
cards.text:
Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor: "You aren't invited."

cards.name: Riftwing Cloudskate
cards.text:
Flying
When Riftwing Cloudskate enters the battlefield, return target permanent to its owner's hand.
Suspend 3—{1}{U} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{U} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

cards.name: Seal of Fire
cards.text: Sacrifice Seal of Fire: Seal of Fire deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
cards.flavor: After the fourth time Chandra left a place engulfed in flames, she decided to just go ahead and make it her thing.

cards.name: Slith Firewalker
cards.text:
Haste
Whenever Slith Firewalker deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
cards.flavor: The slith incubate in the Great Furnace's heat, emerging on Mirrodin's surface only when the four suns have aligned overhead.

cards.name: Soulbright Flamekin
cards.text: {2}: Target creature gains trample until end of turn. If this is the third time this ability has resolved this turn, you may add {R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R} to your mana pool.
cards.flavor: When provoked, a flamekin's inner fire burns far hotter than any giant's forge.

cards.name: Spire Golem
cards.text:
Affinity for Islands (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Island you control.)
Flying
cards.flavor: The longer it soars above the shimmering swirls of the Quicksilver Sea, the more it adopts their unpredictability.

cards.name: Terrain Generator
cards.text:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{2}, {T}: You may put a basic land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.

cards.name: Voidmage Apprentice
cards.text:
Morph {2}{U}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Voidmage Apprentice is turned face up, counter target spell.

cards.name: Wall of Deceit
cards.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{3}: Turn Wall of Deceit face down.
Morph {U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

cards.name: Waterspout Djinn
cards.text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Waterspout Djinn unless you return an untapped Island you control to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor:
"Fly us higher, out of its storm."
—Sisay, captain of the Weatherlight

cards.name: Willbender
cards.text:
Morph {1}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Willbender is turned face up, change the target of target spell or ability with a single target.
